title: Obama reduced the flags to Whitney Houston, but not Nancy Reagan.
subtitle: President Obama didn't order the flags down to half the staff to point to the death of the singer Whitney Houston, while refusing to give this honor to the former First Lady Nancy Reagan.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Obama ordered that flags be raised on half the staff to commemorate the death of the singer Whitney Houston, but he did not give this honour to former First Lady Nancy Reagan.
